email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 15,000MT of wheat from Santos to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN BREEZE for this shipment. The freight quote is USD 45/MT. The vessel has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 200m. Laycan is 1st to 5th October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 45/MT seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the vessel's specifications and the demurrage rate? Also, is there any flexibility in the laycan dates?

Looking forward to your response.
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Liam,

The OCEAN BREEZE has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 200m. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. The laycan dates are flexible, and I can offer a revised freight quote of USD 42/MT. Does this meet your requirements?

Best,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

USD 42/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan dates as 1st to 5th October and send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Liam,

Confirmed. Laycan dates are 1st to 5th October. I will send the contract shortly.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
